system.description:
This small, wooden totem is carved in the shape of a house cat. When you speak the command word, the totem turns into a Tiny calico cat who looks up at you expectantly. The cat is friendly to you and your allies and will purr loudly if acknowledged. If you ask the cat its name, it simply replies, “Mew?”

As a bonus action, you may command the cat to investigate the area ahead. So long as the cat remains within 100 feet of you, you may use an action to see through the cat’s eyes and listen through its ears. The nosy cat has all of the statistics of the cat stat block, though any Perception checks made through its eyes use your modifier (if it is higher). After 10 minutes, or if the cat is reduced to 0 hit points, it reverts back to its totem form and immediately teleports back into your hand. The cat cannot be summoned again in this way until the next day.
system.craftingComponents: A palm-sized block of wood from the Dreaming
